description: 1).  To vary condition 2 attached to 13F/2313 (To erect 31 no. retail units (A1), 7 no. restaurant units (A3). retain and remodeling units with landscaping, parking, access and highway works) So as to allow changes to the size, number and layout of retail and restaurant units and reconfigure internal road and parking layout on land to the west of Montrose Way and to consider as a separate phase of development (The Western Quarter).  Amended plans received December 2016.                                                                                                                            2).  To vary conditions nos. 10;  23;  33;  34 & 37 and remove condition no. 40 attached to 13F/2313 so as to allow:-                                         (i) Trading hours of 0700 to 2200 Mondays to Saturdays and 0800 to 1700 on Sundays and Bank Holidays for units in the Western Quarter; (ii)  Servicing hours between 0500 and 2345 for units in the Western Quarter;                                                                                                    (iii)  Retail sales of ranges of ancillary goods, subdivision of retail units and to allow concessionary sales within retail units.
site_address: Edge Lane Retail Park , Montrose Way , Liverpool , L13
wards: Childwall, Kensington and Fairfield, Old Swan, Picton
